snippet: Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III sustained a mild concussion, and Atlanta beat Washington, 24-17, as Matt Ryan led three scoring drives in the fourth quarter.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Atlanta Falcons defeat Washington Redskins, 24-17; other football scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III sustained a mild concussion, and Atlanta beat Washington, 24-17, as Matt Ryan led three scoring drives in the fourth quarter.

headline.seo: After Robert Griffin III Has Concussion, Falcons Beat Redskins
headline.main: With Griffin Out, the Falcons Rally Past the Redskins
headline.print_headline: With Griffin Out, the Falcons Rally Past the Redskins
